title: FOLLOWING CJ IMPEACHMENT CANADA IS ONE STEP CLOSER TO BOYCOTT LANKA’S SUMMIT SAYS GLOBE AND MAIL
content: By Walter Jayawardhana Canada’s Globe and Mail newspaper said that Canada appeared to be one step closer to boycotting this year’s Commonwealth leaders’ summit Monday as Prime Minister Stephen Harper bluntly called on the Sri Lankan government to reinstate the country’s fired Chief Justice, Shirani Bandaranayaka….
